post:
Hi,

of course I don't wanna miss to post our current special offer on LET :)

Only available today:

[vServer Black Friday 2020 SSD](https://php-friends.de/vserver-ssd/vserver-black-friday-2020-ssd "vServer Black Friday 2020 SSD")

- 2 cores (Intel Xeon E5)
- 120 GB SSD (RAID-10 with ten thousands IOPS and at least 2 GB/s sequential throughput)
- 6 GB ECC RAM
- 1 Gbps uplink
- All of our regular quality standards like 99,9% uptime, redundant power supplies, redundant uplinks and real server hardware in real racks only
- Located at maincubes FRA01 within our own AS running on Juniper & Arista equipment

4,95 EUR per month (paid half-yearly so 29,70€ every 6 months). The price is with VAT included, so many of you will pay less :)

Have fun and feel free to drop your questions right here.

Best Regards,
Tim
